lyrics:
3 contributorsdancing forever lyricsverse 1
i caught you wishin out the window last night
wonder if the moon was talkin back
i got a feelin that you got gods ear yeah
i know i feel like hes closer when youre here
its like youve got this song in your head that nobody else knows
so just follow it baby wherever it goes
its gonna hurt to let you go but baby go fly
so high so i

chorus
i can watch you dancin forever
turnin those stars into letters
write your name in the sky
when you laugh when you cry
just catch the breeze like a feather
turnin your tears into treasures
when youre here when youre gone
ill be here lookin on
so keep on dancin forever

verse 2
theres somethin in the way youre lookin right now
its tellin me my time is runnin out
i guess im waitin on your next move yeah
all this time i thought i was leadin you
now look at you
see old dominion liveget tickets as low as 69you might also likechorus
i can watch you dancin forever
turnin those stars into letters
write your name in the sky
when you laugh when you cry
just catch the breeze like a feather
turnin your tears into treasures
when youre here when youre gone
ill be here lookin on
so keep on dancin forever

bridge
its like youve got this song in your head that nobody else knows
so just follow it baby wherever it goes
its gonna hurt to let you go but baby go fly
so high so i

chorus
i can watch you dancin forever
turnin those stars into letters
write your name in the sky
when you laugh when you cry
just catch the breeze like a feather
turnin your tears into treasures
when youre here when youre gone
ill be here lookin on
so keep on dancin forever
just keep on dancin foreverembed
